markdownRemark.html:
On Saturday, I went to Storm King Art Center. It was chilly, but it was great fall weather for walking around the property. Currently (and through November 8) Lynda Benglis’s Water Sources (seen below) is on display as a special exhibition. The works employ her emblematic, iconic materials of latex rubber and polyurethane foam.

Swinburne Figure I, 2009
